title: What is the relationship between Islam and information technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not sure to understand the question. Islam is a religion, a way of life while Information Technology IT is about computers and technology. What kind of relationship do you think there is between the 2? Its the same if you would ask what is the relationship between Christianity and Information Technology. The question is out of place. There is no relationship between religion and computers/technology
